nodes.text: Zraii was a Verpine who was in charge of repairs and maintenance for Rogue Squadron's fleet of X-wings, as well as other Alliance ships. He also mind wiped and upgraded Wedge Antilles' droid, R5-D2 (commonly known as Mynock), turning it into an R5-G8 named Gate. He narrowly escaped the destruction of Noquivzor at Warlord Zsinj's hands.
